titleStmt.title: A declaration of the commander in chief in Scotland and the officers under his command, in vindication of the liberties of the people and priviledges of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.
England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgens ... and re-printed at London for general satisfaction,

notesStmt.note: "Signed in the name, and by consent of the commander in chief, and the officers of the army in Scotland, [signed] VVilliam Clark, secretary."
The commander in chief was George Monck.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
